content.rendered:
We wish you a happy holiday season and a great 2020 from everyone at Falanx Cyber.

 

 

Set for 2020?

Whether it’s a penetration test, threat monitoring services, security awareness training or ethical phishing, Falanx Cyber has got you covered. Get in touch with us today to find out how we can help you achieve your 2020 goals.

 

 

Our Christmas Office and Support Hours

Over the holiday period support for customers with 24/7 services will continue as usual. Back office services will be offline over public holidays. Anyone requiring emergency cyber incident response should contact 020 3997 8647.

 

 

Upcoming events

Falanx Cyber is sponsoring Securing the Law Firm on January 23nd, 2020.

excerpt.rendered: We wish you a happy holiday season and a great 2020 from everyone at Falanx Cyber….
